item.title: Speeches on the UK's future relationship with the EU by Theresa May and Boris Johnson: Lions vs. Unicorns
item.description:
Professor Steve Peers, University of Essex Speeches delivered last week by Theresa May and Boris Johnson regarding the UK’s future relationship with the EU present a study in contrasts. May’s approach was measured and pragmatic, advocating for close ties, while Johnson’s came across as dismissive and lacking depth, favoring distance from the EU. While the EU27 has begun drafting treaty texts for Brexit, the UK has not. To illustrate potential outcomes, this post includes draft treaties based on Johnson’s and May’s security proposals...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/speeches-on-the-uk-s-future-relationship-with-the-eu-by-theresa-may-and-boris-johnson-lions-vs-unicorns/
